text: (upbeat music)

- Hi, I'm Sounil Yu, creator
of the Cyber Defense Matrix.

Timely situational
awareness helps you know
when a security event has occurred.

Analysis of machine data in our
environment can provide this
making it important to aggregate
and correlate all types of machine data

such as logs, flows,
configuration changes,
and other events.

Analyzing and correlating
this information as it occurs

can help reduce the time
to detect, troubleshoot,
and resolve security issues.
AWS Marketplace has security information
and event management providers

that provide out of the box
pre-built security analytics,

visualizations, alerting,
and reporting for data
from nearly every major AWS service.

Running a SIM within AWS
brings tremendous advantages,

especially with respect
to horizontal scaling
of both storage and compute resources

to handle nearly any volume
of data coming into the SIM.
Many solutions also incorporate
external threat intelligence sources
and consume information from hundreds
of other vendor products to bring context
and help prioritize alerts.
To help streamline workflows,

they also integrate with
popular ticketing systems
to ensure that priority alerts

don't fall through the
cracks and get lost.
Constant vigilance is needed to detect
and to respond to incidents quickly.

Tools like Ascend can give
you the situational awareness

that you need to keep
your environment secure.
